fr.flowarg.flowupdater.versions

Class AbstractForgeVersion

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.flowarg.flowupdater.versions.AbstractModLoaderVersion
      • fr.flowarg.flowupdater.versions.AbstractForgeVersion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICurseFeaturesUser, IModrinthFeaturesUser, IModLoaderVersion
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NewForgeVersion, OldForgeVersion

    public abstract class AbstractForgeVersion
extends AbstractModLoaderVersion
    The base object of a forge version. Implemented by OldForgeVersion and NewForgeVersion
